Sound.comm: Good sound quality for mids and highs.

cont.entity_a: Great sound with tons of mid bass and clear, crisp highs.
cont.entity_b: Sound quality is solid but lacks in low frequency performance. Lacks bass at higher volumes. Decent mid bass and treble for the price.

Installation.comm: Easy to install but may require modifications.

cont.entity_a: May require wall modifications due to size. 22-inch wide speaker requires cutting wall studs for installation.
cont.entity_b: Speakers require modification for installation in some vehicles. May require drilling new holes.

cont.entity_a: Solid speaker chassis prevents component vibration. Grill is difficult to remove and may bend during removal. Tweeters can be pivoted towards seating. Well-made with a nice mesh cover.
cont.entity_b: Speakers are smaller than advertised, requiring adapters.

cont.entity_a: No mid-low cutoff control available. Requires a subwoofer for low frequencies. Speaker lacks a separate midrange driver.
cont.entity_b: Not suitable for high power amps, as they may blow.
Great as a budget replacement for factory speakers.

cont.entity_a: Excellent as a center channel speaker in surround systems.
cont.entity_b: Comes with wires, but they are of low quality.
